text: Dmytro Topalov (; born 12 March 1998) is a professional Ukrainian football midfielder who plays on loan for FC Mariupol in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==Career== Born in Volnovakha Raion of the Donetsk Oblast, Topalov is a product of Shakhtar Donetsk youth sportive school system. He made his début for FC Mariupol in the Ukrainian Premier League as a second half-time substitute in the losing match against FC Kolos Kovalivka on 30 July 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Volnovakha Raion Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Mariupol players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ukraine youth international footballers
title: Dmytro Topalov
